data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Tutong, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tutong, Brunei
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Tutong to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Tutong.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Tutong to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Brunei Malay, Kedayan people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Tutong who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Tutong unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Tutong, Brunei who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

location.name: Tutong
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Min Nan, Han Chinese, Cantonese, Brunei Malay, Kedayan, Kayan, Busang, Sinhalese
